summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Smith Street, from 4th Avenue West to 5th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; also West Smith Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 4th Avenue West (south side) by constructing concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8691 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
